nodes.description: 土耳其航空因天气原因取消前往摩加迪沙的航班
nodes.support_text: Turkish Airlines canceled its flight to Mogadishu last week due to bad weather and said the company will not make any further comment.

nodes.description: Daallo航空接手载有74名乘客的航班，其中包括携带爆炸物的自杀式袭击者
nodes.support_text: Daallo picked up the 70 stranded Turkish Airlines passengers to fly them to Djibouti, including the suicide bomber. In total, the flight had 74 passengers.

nodes.description: 爆炸导致机舱被撕开1米宽缺口，袭击者被吸出机舱，飞机紧急迫降摩加迪沙
nodes.support_text: The bomber was sucked out of the plane through the 1-metre-wide hole when the blast ripped open the pressurized cabin in flight, officials said.

nodes.description: 调查发现袭击者通过机场工作人员交接藏有笔记本电脑的炸弹
nodes.support_text: CCTV footage released by the Somali National Intelligence Agency (NISA) appears to show two airport workers inside the terminal handing the suicide bomber a laptop, according to the government spokesman.

nodes.description: 摩加迪沙机场逮捕多名工作人员并启动安全调查
nodes.support_text: Somali officials said an investigation had been launched and arrests made, including airport workers.

nodes.description: Daallo航空确认将提升在索马里的运营，继续执行国际航班
nodes.support_text: We have been there for 25 years, he said. "Our efforts to keep Somalia linked to the rest of the world will continue."

nodes.description: 美国官员指认基地组织关联的Al Shabaab为爆炸责任方
nodes.support_text: U.S. officials said on Monday the United States suspects Islamist militant group al Shabaab, which has links to al Qaeda, was responsible for the blast.

nodes.description: 摩加迪沙机场加强安检并引入新技术防范类似袭击
nodes.support_text: security at the airport has been stepped up and that the government was seeking new technologies to improve screenings.

nodes.description: 袭击者强迫飞机紧急降落
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：袭击者强迫飞机紧急降落；支持文本：事件发生时飞机因爆炸导致机舱受损，被迫紧急迫降
语义描述：飞机停放在机场；支持文本：Daallo航空接手载有74名乘客的航班后停放在摩加迪沙机场
语义描述：Daallo总裁星期一表示；支持文本：Daallo航空确认将提升在索马里的运营，继续执行国际航班

nodes.description: 乘客（袭击者）使用土耳其航空登机牌登机
nodes.support_text: 乘客（袭击者）使用土耳其航空登机牌登机

nodes.description: 多数乘客原计划乘坐土耳其航空航班
nodes.support_text: 多数乘客原计划乘坐土耳其航空航班

nodes.description: Mohamed Yassin向路透社披露信息
nodes.support_text: Mohamed Yassin向路透社披露信息

nodes.description: Daallo驾驶航班将70名乘客飞往吉布提
nodes.support_text: Daallo picked up the 70 stranded Turkish Airlines passengers to fly them to Djibouti, including the suicide bomber. In total, the flight had 74 passengers.
语义描述：调查启动；支持文本：已识别动词事件'launch'的语义描述

nodes.description: 袭击者与航空或机场人员有联系
nodes.support_text: 语义描述：袭击者与航空或机场人员有联系；支持文本：已识别动词事件'have'的语义描述
